name: T-Shrek: Rebirth
description:
Continuation of the legendary game about T-Shrek. Find the traces of the murders and solve the ancient mystery of the swamp! Awaken the ancient evil and save the swamp from the curse forever. A stunning game made in the ps1 retro style with elements of horror. A large map and pseudo-random item generation will not let you get bored. In this game you will be able to
  • Running away from T-Shrek
  • Collect evidence and soda
  • Explore the big lands
  • Defeat T-Shrek
Download now and get unforgettable emotions!
